original_text: But she had brought them up to the roof and hid them with the stalks of flax that she had laid in order on the roof.
korean_text: 그가 이미 그들을 이끌고 지붕에 올라가서 그 지붕에 벌여 놓은 삼대에 숨겼더라

sentences.original_text: But she had brought them up to the roof
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그녀는 그들을 지붕으로 데려 올렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and hid them with the stalks of flax
that she had laid in order on the roof.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 지붕 위에 그것들을 차례로 펼쳐 두었습니다
